# init(text:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a text-based note with the specified content.

## Declaration

```swift
init(text: String)
```

## Parameters

- **text**: The text to include in the main content of the note.

## Return Value

An initialized text note object or `nil` if the object could not be created.
title: init(text:)
